  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the controller after its root element has been completely processed. This method is automatically called by the FXMLLoader.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resources - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

    • createToyFromString

      private Toy createToyFromString(String toyString)

    • clearButtonPressed

      void clearButtonPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Clears the input fields for serial number, name, and type.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the clear button

    • searchButtonPressed

      void searchButtonPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Event handler for the search button. Retrieves inputs from user interface elements and performs a search using the Coordinator class.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the search button.

    • purchaseButtonPressed

      void purchaseButtonPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Event handler for the purchase button.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the button press.

    • addButton

      Void addButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is called when the add button is clicked. It retrieves the values from the input fields, validates them, and creates a new toy object based on the selected category. The new toy object is then added to the Coordinator class. If any validation errors occur or an exception is thrown, an error message is displayed. After adding the toy, the input fields are cleared.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the add button.

    • saveButtonPressed

      void saveButtonPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the event when the save button is pressed. Calls the `saveToysToFile` method in the `Coordinator` class to save toys to a file.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the save button

    • removeButton

      void removeButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Event handler for the removeButton. Removes a selected toy from the removeListView. If a toy is not selected, it tries to remove a toy based on the provided id from the removeSearchBox. Calls the Coordinator's removeToy method to remove the toy from the system.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the removeButton.

    • removeSearchButton

      void removeSearchButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Event handler for the removeSearchButton. Removes a search based on the entered ID from the removeListView. If sorting options are selected, sorts the removeListView accordingly.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the removeSearchButton.

    • sortButtonPressed

      void sortButtonPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the event when the sort button is pressed. Sorts the resultsListView based on the selected sorting criteria.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the sort button.

    • remSortButtonPressed

      void remSortButtonPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the event when the remSortButton is pressed. Sorts the items in the removeListView based on the selected sorting criteria. If remSerialNumSort is selected, sorts the items by serial number. If remNameSort is selected, sorts the items by name. If remTypeSort is selected, sorts the items by brand.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by pressing the remSortButton

    • recSearch

      void recSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Performs a recommendation search based on the provided age, type, and maximum price. Updates the recommendation list view with the results.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event that triggered the search.
